full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI CHOS SKOR LAS, BLA BLU'I CHO GA RIN CHEN SROG GI CHAD MTHUD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013B BLA BLU'I CHO GA RIN CHEN SROG GI CHAD MTHUD ZHES BYA BA 'DI BLA 'GUGS DGOS PA 'GA' ZHIG GI SKABS, LAG TU BZA' BTUNG GI RIGS ZHIG THOGS TE, MING NAS KHYI 'BOD PA BZHIN BYED PA LAS` BYA THABS GZHA MI SHES PA MANG PO MTHONG BAS RKYEN BYAS TE, MDOS GTO GLUNG GYI CHO GA 'DI RIGS SDE SNOD LA SBYANGS PA'I DGE BSHES RNAMS 'GAL RKYEN MING CING LTO 'GRANGS NYI MAS ROS PA'I SKABS SBANGS BYA DANG, NAD GDON SOGS KYIS GCOS DUS BLANG BYAR MDZAD PAS, SPANGS BLANG GANG GI PHYOGS YIN PA MA SHES KYANG, MKHAR PHAN NA KHYI TSIL GYI DPE BZHIN, NYE BAR MKHO BA'I SKABS KYANG SRID SNYAMS TE @014A*, ,BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA BA'I SKYED MOS TSAL DU BRIS PA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,
